import tick from '../../img/green-tick.png' import close from '../../img/close.svg' import './TodoList.css' const TodoList = (props) => { return (
props.handleTodo(props.todo.id)} style={{cursor: "pointer"}}>{ props.todo.label}
props.handleSolve(props.todo.id, props.todo.label)} id={props.todo.complete ? 'unhidden' : 'hidden'}>
props.handleClose(props.todo.id)}>
) } export default TodoList
